name: All Humans Must Die
description:
ALL HUMANS MUST DIE! is a little action game I made in GB Studio.

Feel free to Download the file and post your highscore in the comments.

Features:

  • playable on real GameBoy hardware (DMG & Color)
  • highscore system
  • save/load your highscore
  • handmade visuals

This version is still in beta status. Music and SFX are placeholders and will be added in the final build.
I appreciate every bug report or other feedback you can provide. Thank you very much in advance and hope you have some fun with my short little game :)
